overview: Salvatore took a Degree in Business & Finance in 1999. he started his career within the world of the Internet as a consultant on its use for small & medium enterprises within a project financed by the IBM Foundation. Following this experience, he gained valuable expertise in Internet marketing and advertising by working for BuyCentral, LookSmart and Altavista. Before founding GoAdv, he was Managing Director of the Web Agency ADVance.
